co.paralleluniverse.remote.galaxy

Class RemoteChannelReceiver<Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.remote.galaxy.RemoteChannelReceiver<Message>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.MessageListener

    public class RemoteChannelReceiver<Message>
extends Object
implements co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.MessageListener
    This class listens to messages received from remote ends of a channel, and forwards them to the right channel.
